Identification_Area.title: Test Document with author_list and Simple Citation_Information

Citation_Information.author_list: Frank, Louis A.; Ackerson, Kent L.
Citation_Information.description: This is a two-character test document having a label with attribute author_list and simple class Citation_Information. This example illustrates use of author_list in PDS4 IM v1.20.0.0.

Document.document_name: Test Document with author_list and Simple Citation_Information
Document.description: This is a two-character test document having a label with attribute author_list and simple class Citation_Information. This example illustrates use of author_list in PDS4 IM v1.20.0.0.
